price: Hao wanao fanya kuwa pamoja na Mwenyezi Mungu yupo mungu mwingine.Basi, watakuja jua!
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Hao washirikina mawazo yao yamedhoofika, ndio wakafanya kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu anao miungu mingine ya masanamu. Na watakuja jua matokeo ya ushirikina wao itapo wateremkia adhabu chungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
